sub_title: Cluster Manager Real Estate and Portfolio development BeNeLux & France at Shell
summary: Experience in diverse business environments. Skilled in Business, Finance, Operations Management, Business Process Management and Continuous Improvement. Strong professional with a Master of Science (MSc) focused in Strategic Management & Accounting. Driving performance and growth with an energizing and collaborative style. Ability to quickly adapt to new situations and lead team to respond.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

courses.name: VCA-VOL Veiligheid voor Operationeel Leidinggevenden VCA

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Development of our Mobility Network across the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg and France. 

* Manage and lead the Real Estate portfolio strategy and delivery for the Benefrux cluster
* Property / Portfolio management and Financial management of our network real estate 
* Acquisition of new sites to the network either through auctions, tenders and bilateral deals across the cluster.
* Management of key dealer relationships and to retain and grow the dealer network in the Netherlands
* Grow the Network for Low Emission Fuels and EV charging
profile_positions.title: Cluster Manager Real Estate and Portfolio development | BeNeLux & France

profile_positions.description:
Operations Manager for Shell retail business in BeNeLux and France, member of the Retail Management Team.

Responsibilities include:
- Member of the Retail Management Team for Benelux and France
- Discuss, monitor and improve, jointly with National Sales Manager and General Manager, the Retailer Performance
- Responsible for overall fit-for-purpose, i.e. legally and commercially, Retailer Business Agreements
- Responsible for annual Retailer Business Planning and agent commission budget
- Responsible for Sustainability agenda 
- Responsible for Continuous improvement
- Responsible for NFR (Non-Fuels Retailing) Operations
- Lead reduction or optimization of (Retailer) costs through e.g. smart benchmarking and/or providing competitive umbrella contracts for the retailers
- Contract Holder for various umbrella contracts for Retail Site Operations
- Ensure compliance to Operating Principles and asses/manage any variances and support implementation of new processes, procedures and systems
- Overall responsible to manage and ensure execution of the Global Site Procedures and Policies Manual
- Maintain strong external focus to understand (technological) solutions to improve site operations.
- Key interface with our SBO’s
profile_positions.title: Retail Operations Manager BeNeLux & France

profile_positions.description:
Finance lead in Change Facilitation team. As part of this team and the site's extended leadership team,  leading the site to achieve its vision, specifically in its journey towards the financial target of the site. 

Responsibilities include:
• Driving continuous improvement opportunities in both costs and margin, using LEAN/OE/CI tools.
• Increasing cash mindset on site. 
• Making a significant contribution to the business performance, with a strong commercial mindset. 
• Ensuring robust and transparent financials in the site's long-term strategic plan.
• Improving the way, we negotiate and manage contracts to drive down spend on materials and services
profile_positions.title: Lead Business Controller | Finance Lead

profile_positions.description:
Working on developing the success of Moerdijk as one of the most competitive chemicals sites in the world, working across multiple lines of business and finance departments as well as with external stakeholders. 

Responsibilities include:
• Providing finance in the business support to a production unit.
• Providing finance in the business support to a logistical unit. 
• Supporting these units in delivering their business plan targets.
• Ensuring a robust cost review, thereby collaborating with the business to understand cost drivers and performance and translating this into actions. 
• Driving continuous improvement opportunities in both costs and margin, using LEAN tools.
• Making a significant contribution to the business performance, with a strong commercial mindset. 
• Responsible for coordinating the business plan and latest estimates for the site and deliver management information. 
• Ensuring robust and transparent financials in the site's long-term strategic plan.
profile_positions.title: Business Controller | Finance Advisor

company.name: General Electric | Global Growth & Operations - Europe

profile_positions.description:
Leading HQ activities and initiatives in close co-operation with the Global Operations Finance centers in Europe and Corporate controllership in US. Responsible for ensuring activities are performed consistently across the pole, applying the highest quality standards and in the most efficient way. Driving continuous improvement and simplification of processes and raising the level of expertise in the Global Operations Finance team in the area of controllership. 

Responsibilities include:
•	Operational and technical controllership in Europe. 
•	Financial analysis of balance sheet accounts to ensure: compliance with GE policies, completeness of account balances, integrity of financial reporting and effectiveness of the underlying business processes. 
•	Annual pre-close reviews. 
•	Controllership dashboard and controllership metrics reporting. 
•	Account reconciliation reporting to senior management. 
•	Provide support to the internal audit teams on account reconciliation audits. 
•	Driving simplification initiatives.
•	Continuous improvement of processes.
•	Provide training and guidance to teams across Europe.
•	Migration activities to central shared service center.
•	Various projects within HQ team.
profile_positions.title: Lead Controller

profile_positions.description:
Driving and improving controllership and related processes for GE International Inc. Netherlands, GE International Inc. Belgium, GE Luxembourg Holdings. 

Responsibilities include:
•	Manage the accounting, close and reporting process of 3 corporate ledgers. 
•	Drive payroll, VAT and tax accounting for these ledgers.
•	Analytical review of monthly balance sheets.
•	Review, align and improve the operational processes of the ledgers.
•	Drive simplification and continuous improvement of financial processes.
•	Establish an effective operating rhythm with the offshore team.
•	Manage offshore team and onshore accountant.
•	Drive various finance, tax and legal projects that are related to these ledgers.
•	Maintain align and develop relationships with Finance Managers and Controllers across GE.
profile_positions.title: Controller

profile_positions.description:
Auditor of wide variety of engagements. From smaller domestic companies up to large listed international companies within different segments like production, industrial, pension/insurance, healthcare, retail and transportation. Promoted within 3 years from trainee to supervisor (accelerated promotion). 

Responsibilities include:
•	Audit planning.
•	Managing and review of the team. 
•	Maintaining contact with clients (preceding, during and after the audit).
•	Project management and Job-control.
•	Audit of internal control and (financial) processes
•	Audit of financial statements.
•	Reporting.
•	Completion of the audit.
•	Personal coach.
•	Training and evaluation of less experienced colleagues.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor

company.name: Stichting Provinciale Entadministratie Noord-Brabant (Cooperation of Provincial Vaccination Adm.)

profile_positions.company: Stichting Provinciale Entadministratie Noord-Brabant (Cooperation of Provincial Vaccination Adm.)
profile_positions.description: Design and implementation of ISO quality control. Assisting the managing director, medical advisor and quality controller in daily work.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Quality Control and Management assistant
